data.description: Fluke is seeking a dynamic and highly-motivated SW Product Management Intern to join our team for summer 2026! This role provides an outstanding opportunity for a proactive individual keen on gaining practical experience in product management and making a meaningful contribution to our business. Key Responsibilities: Product Development: Work closely with our team in the development of innovative product features and enhancements that uplift the user experience. Your contribution will help shape our product offerings based on customer needs and market trends. 1. Market Research: Undertake comprehensive market research. Your insights will help us understand our competitive landscape, identify market opportunities, and make informed decisions on product improvements. 2. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate effectively with various teams including sales, marketing, and engineering. This will ensure our products are aligned with market trends and client needs. 3. Product ...
